data.title: gaiden special drama CD
data.meta_description: Thats my italian translation to the gaiden special drama cd! thanks to Veronica for the track! http://codeveronica.iobloggo.com/690/saiyuki-gaiden-ova-special-cd-traduzione Summary : Goku (gaiden) is sleeping at Tenpous place and is  daddy Konzen comes to pick him…
data.text:
That’s my italian translation to the gaiden special drama cd! thanks to Veronica for the track!

http://codeveronica.iobloggo.com/690/saiyuki-gaiden-ova-special-cd-traduzione

Summary: Goku (gaiden) is sleeping at Tenpou’s place and is ”daddy” Konzen comes to pick him up, Goku wakes up and his friends act strange. He is shocked to see Konzen and Kenren arguing and Tenpou cleaning the room and is more shocked to see Konzen smoking.

He (in saiyuki form) wakes up now he is in an inn and he find is companion acting strange. Sanzo is worried he sees that he’s acting strange and believes he has a fever , Gojyo is making coffee and ordering Hakkai to be more mannered and to put his socks in the laudry case and is worried for jeep outside, he is shocked to see Hakkai smoking and Sanzo is pretty kind. Then some youkai attack them and Hakkai tells to Sanzo to go away to protect Goku.

Goku wakes up (in gaiden form) and now his friends are back to normal and talks about how beautiful the cherry trees are.

Goku wakes up (in saiyuki form) his companion are back to normal and talks about animals… (Gojyo says that Goku eats like a pig, Hakkai says that is not fair to use pigs, in this case cows are better, pigs are good guys, Sanzo remarks that in the end every animals are better then Kappas). Goku is happy he doesn’t remember his dreams,but he knows it was beautiful.
